text: Michel Serrault (24 January 1928 – 29 July 2007) was a French stage and movie actor. He appeared from 1954 until 2007 in more than 130 movies. He met and worked with Jean Poiret in the early 1950s. Their movies were Cette sacrée gamine (1956) with Brigitte Bardot and Sacha Guitry's last movie (1957). ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2007 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors
title: Michel Serrault
